• The SPOT® smartphone application utilizes GPS to identify your location and provided you with a list of the nearest transit agencies.

  • No nearby agencies? Fear not! The app will display a list of all SPOT®-powered agencies for you to choose from and plan your travel routes.

  • Simply select your desired route(s) and click the map button to view the route status on an interactive map.

  • Routes are color coded for convenience and ease of display. It’s incredibly easy to identify routes, stops, and plan your trip.

  • Click on any stop to view current status and estimated times of arrival.

  • On the route screen, click the Stops button to view additional information about your chosen route.

  • The Stops screen displays names for all stops along the route, current estimated times of arrival, and shared route stops.

  • Receive real-time updates about route information so that you can adjust your schedule accordingly.

  • The main menu of the SPOT® application allows you to select your transit agency, leave feedback, rate our app, access helpful information, and connect with us via social media channels.

  • Select your desired agency to load applicable routes.

  • Please rate this app and leave feedback about improvements we could make to its functionality. Your input is highly valued to improve your overall experience!
